players.name: Alice
memory: Diana: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one who got eliminated during the night. Let's keep an eye on each other and try to figure out if there are any patterns or clues."

Diana: "Let's not jump to conclusions just yet. We still have a lot to learn about each other and the game. Let's focus on gathering information and trying to understand the dynamics of the group."

You: "Let's focus on gathering information and trying to understand the dynamics of the group. I'll start by asking: Bob, can you tell us more about your background and what makes you think you're not a mafia member?"
